item1.name: Galeforce
item1.description:
60 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance

Active - Cloudburst: Dash in target direction, firing three missiles at the lowest Health enemy near your destination (prioritizing champions). Deals a total of (180 - 220 (based on level) + 45% bonus Attack Damage) magic damage, increased against low Health targets by up to 50% (90s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 3% Move Speed

Maxiumum missile damage dealt when enemy Health is below 30%.
Cloudburst's dash cannot pass through terrain.

item2.name: Serpent's Fang
item2.description:
55 Attack Damage
18 Lethality
  • Shield Reaver: Attacks and spells deal (70 + 40% bonus Attack Damage) additional physical damage to Shielded targets.

    Additional damage not applied to targets with shields that only block magic damage.

item3.name: Lord Dominik's Regards
item3.description:
35 Attack Damage
20% Critical Strike Chance
35% Armor Penetration
  • Giant Slayer: Deal up to 15% bonus physical damage against champions with greater max Health than you.

    Max damage increase reached when Health difference is greater than 2000.

item4.name: Executioner's Calling
item4.description:

Hitting an enemy champion with 3 attacks or separate abilities within 4s grants 25 - 40% Move Speed based on level and 75% Slow Resistance.

This is increased to 40 - 60% Move Speed for Melee champions.

Duration: 3s
Cooldown: 15s

45 Move Speed

item2.description: 40 Attack Damage

item3.name: Serpent's Fang
item3.description:
55 Attack Damage
18 Lethality
  • Shield Reaver: Attacks and spells deal (70 + 40% bonus Attack Damage) additional physical damage to Shielded targets.

    Additional damage not applied to targets with shields that only block magic damage.

item4.name: Mortal Reminder
item4.description:
20 Attack Damage
25% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
7% Move Speed
  • Sepsis: Dealing physical damage applies 40% Grievous Wounds to enemy champions for 3 seconds. Dealing 3 consecutive Attacks to an enemy champion enhances this effect to 60% Grievous Wounds against them until the effect is allowed to elapse.

    Grievous Wounds reduces the effectiveness of Healing and Regeneration effects on the target.

item5.name: Immortal Shieldbow
item5.description:
55 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance
12% Life Steal
  • Lifeline: When taking damage that would reduce you below 30% Health, gain a 250 - 700 Shield for 3s. In addition, gain 15% Life Steal for 8s (90s cooldown).

    Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 5 Attack Damage and 50 Health.

item6.name: Oracle Lens
item6.description: Active - Trinket: Scans around you, warning against hidden enemy units, revealing invisible traps and revealing (and temporarily disabling) enemy Stealth Wards for 10 seconds (90 - 60s cooldown).

item1.description:

You may carry up to 2 Control Wards. Control Wards do not disable other Control Wards.

item1.name: Galeforce
item1.description:
60 Attack Damage
20% Attack Speed
20% Critical Strike Chance

Active - Cloudburst: Dash in target direction, firing three missiles at the lowest Health enemy near your destination (prioritizing champions). Deals a total of (180 - 220 (based on level) + 45% bonus Attack Damage) magic damage, increased against low Health targets by up to 50% (90s cooldown).

Mythic Passive: Grants all other Legendary items 3% Move Speed

Maxiumum missile damage dealt when enemy Health is below 30%.
Cloudburst's dash cannot pass through terrain.

perk0.shortDesc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
perk0.longDesc:
Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized

Energized attacks heal you for 3 - 60 (+0.3 Bonus AD, +0.3 AP) and grant 20% Move Speed for 1s.

Healing from minions is 20% effective for Ranged Champions.
